faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Complete guide on image splitters and Instagram grid makers.

whatIsImageSplitter.question: What is an image splitter and how does it work?
whatIsImageSplitter.answer: An image splitter is a digital tool that divides a single image into multiple smaller parts. Our web-based image splitter uses advanced algorithms to split your images into perfect grids or segments. Simply upload your image, choose your image splitting method, and download the results. All processing happens directly in your browser, ensuring your image privacy and security.

howToSplitImage.question: How do I split an image into multiple parts?
howToSplitImage.answer: It's simple: 1) Upload your image (supports JPG, PNG, GIF, etc., max 10MB), 2) Choose your preferred splitting mode - vertical split, horizontal split, or grid split, 3) Adjust rows and columns, 4) Click the split image button, 5) Download individual segments or get a ZIP package.

instagramGridMaker.question: Can I use this tool to create Instagram grid posts?
instagramGridMaker.answer: Absolutely! Our image splitter is perfect for creating Instagram grid layouts and carousel posts. Popular formats include 3x3 grids for feed puzzles, strips for carousel stories, and custom dimensions for unique layouts. The output ensures perfect compatibility with Instagram requirements.

splitImage3x3.question: How do I create a 3x3 grid for Instagram?
splitImage3x3.answer: To create perfect 3x3 Instagram grids: 1) Upload a square image for best results, 2) Select 'Grid' mode from the options, 3) Set both rows and columns to 3, 4) Split the image. This creates 9 equal segments that form a complete puzzle when posted sequentially on Instagram.

supportedFormats.question: What file formats are supported?
supportedFormats.answer: Our image splitter supports all common image formats, including JPG, PNG, GIF, and WebP. You can also export split images as JPG, PNG, WebP, or BMP formats. Maximum file size is 10MB with dimensions up to 4096x4096 pixels for optimal performance.

freeToUse.question: Is this tool completely free?
freeToUse.answer: Yes, our image splitter is 100% free with no hidden costs. There are no watermarks on your images, no account registration required, and no usage limits. Use it freely for personal projects, commercial content, or business purposes.

imageQuality.question: Will the split image quality be affected?
imageQuality.answer: Not at all! We use lossless processing techniques to maintain your original image quality. Split images retain the same resolution and clarity as your source image, ensuring your social media content looks professional.

privacySecurity.question: Is my uploaded content secure?
privacySecurity.answer: Your privacy is our top priority. Using our image splitter, all image processing happens directly in your browser - nothing is uploaded to our servers. Your images never leave your device, and we don't store or access any of your content. Completely private and secure.

mobileFriendly.question: Does this tool work on mobile devices?
mobileFriendly.answer: Absolutely! Our image splitter is fully responsive and works perfectly on smartphones and tablets. You can upload images from your photo gallery, process them, and download results directly to your device. The interface automatically adapts to all screen sizes for a smooth experience.

batchProcessing.question: Can I split multiple images at once?
batchProcessing.answer: Currently, the tool processes one image at a time to ensure optimal performance and quality. However, processing is fast - you can quickly split multiple images by repeating the simple upload and process steps.

customDimensions.question: Can I create custom grid dimensions with your image splitter?
customDimensions.answer: Absolutely! Beyond popular presets like 3x3 and 2x3, you can create custom grid dimensions up to 10x10. Simply adjust the rows and columns to meet your specific needs, whether for unique social media layouts or special projects.
